name: Tripping Staff

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Weapon Focus (quarterstaff), base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: You treat quarterstaves as if they had the trip special feature.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: If you are a magus with the staff magus archetype, you can use spellstrike on any trip combat maneuver you make with the staff.
sections.name: Special

description: You can make a trip attack with your quarterstaff.
